en.desc: Simple paragraph test
Sentence ending with )
Exclamation, punctuation test
Multiple sentences
Multiple sections - div, h1, paragraph
Sentence starting with a link
Sentence starting with a link and ending with a link
Figure
References can appear after period without space. Example: Hydrogen is a gas.[1] It is ...
References can appear after period without space, repeated. Example: Hydrogen is a gas.[1][2][3] It is ...
References can appear inside a sentence. Example: Hydrogen is a gas[1] and it is ...
References can appear inside a sentence. Example:Hydrogen's atomic number is one. Hydrogen is a gas[1] and it is ..... Test the flags are reset properly
References can appear repeated inside a sentence. Example: Hydrogen is a gas[1][2][3] and it is ...
References can appear after period and space. Example: Hydrogen is a gas. [1] It is ...
Paragraph from Debian article- repeating references
References after closing bracket and period.
Three sentences in a single text node

Paragraph ending with reference and already having reference in between. The second reference should not be identified as repeating reference. If identified as repeating reference, 7 letters from last word will be missing.
Sentences ending with abbreviations
link element inside span element
Do not break inside of links with abbreviations. Example: Carl E. Wieman. See https://phabricator.wikimedia.org/T99504
